Against this spirit, and against the false religion of sentimentalism, which is equally dangerous. I bear my warning. Take heed, brethren and sisters. Who is your leader?--Christ, or the 


                             -100- 

angel who fell from heaven? Are you sound in the faith? My prayer for you all is that God would grant you "according to the riches of His glory, to be strengthened with might by His Spirit in the inner man; that Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love, may be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height; and to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fullness of God." 


                               -101-
